title: Platinum Ears
description: This is a game used for ear-training. It includes the four most important pillars in audio: balance, panning, EQ, and compression. Become better at mixing music!

title: Tech-Sync
description: This is a MERN stack-based job matching platform. Job-seekers can sign up and match with jobs, while employers can sign up and post jobs that match with job-seekers.

title: Online Clothing Store
description: This is a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack-based app. It is an e-commerce clothing store with clothes for women, men, and children.
